#from math import *
test_case = int(raw_input())

while(test_case>0):
    
    n = int(raw_input())
    count_pie = 0
    pie_weight = []
    rack_limit = []
    pie_weight = map(int,raw_input().split())
    rack_limit = map(int,raw_input().split())
    
    pie_weight.sort()
    rack_limit.sort()
    
    i=0
    j=0
    while(i<n and j<n):
        
        while(j<n and pie_weight[i]>rack_limit[j]):
            j+=1
            
        if(j<n):
            count_pie+=1
            j+=1
        i+=1
        
    print count_pie
    
    test_case-=1
